name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Descrollify — Limit Your YouTube Shorts Watchtime

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that prevents and limits endless scrolling through short videos, helping you stay focused and save time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Descrollify is here to help you stay focused, minimize distractions, and save valuable time. It doesn't simply restrict or remove short videos; it empowers you to consciously limit your watch time.

✦ AUTOMATIC SCROLLING PREVENTION: Stop continuous scrolling through short videos on YouTube. Descrollify will automatically block videos when it's too much.

✦ PERSONAL LIMITS: Set a personal limit on the number of short videos you can watch to manage your time more effectively.

✦ FOCUS MODE: Completely hide short video content from your feed and automatically redirect to prevent accidentally opening a short video.

✦ Understand Your Habits: Descrollify tracks your viewing habits locally in your browser, providing personal statistics to help you better manage your video consumption.

Transform the way you interact with short video content online. Install Descrollify now and take back your time to focus on what truly matters.
